# HUD::SHOW_HEADING_INDICATOR_ON_BLIP

## Summary
Shows the heading indicator on this blip

## Parameters
* **BLIP_INDEX** blip
* **BOOL** show

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Adds the GTA: Online player heading indicator to a blip.
